response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its worth, I believe it's only fair to offer it to you at a special introductory price. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase this product for $14,500. This offer represents a significant savings compared to the market value of $15,000, making it a fantastic deal for you. I trust that you'll appreciate the quality and benefits this product offers. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
